T06sthtvbhu:3: tathā hy ātmadṛṣṭiprabhavā rāgādayaḥ kleśāḥ pudgalanairātmyāvabodhaś ca satkāyadṛṣṭeḥ pratipakṣatvāt tatprahāṇāya pravartamānaḥ sarvakleśān prajahāti |
T06sthtvbhu:6: kleśā hi mokṣaprāpter āvaraṇam iti atas teṣu prahīṇeṣu mokṣo 'dhigamyate |
T06sthtvbhu:7: jñeyāvaraṇam api sarvasmin jñeye jñānapravṛttipratibandhabhūtam akliṣṭam ajñānam |
T06sthtvbhu:8: tasmin prahīṇe sarvākāre jñeye 'saktam apratihatañ ca jñānaṃ pravartata ity ataḥ sarvajñatvam adhigamyate |
T06sthtvbhu:9: atha vā dharmapudgalābhiniviṣṭāś cittamātraṃ yathābhūtaṃ na jānantīty ato dharmapudgalanairātmyapradarśanena saphale vijñaptimātre 'nupūrveṇa
T06sthtvbhu:11: atha vā vijñānavad vijñeyam api dravyata eveti kecin manyante |
T06sthtvbhu:12: vijñeyavad vijñānam api saṃvṛtita eva na paramārthata ity asya dviprakārasyāpy ekāntavādasya pratiṣedhārthaḥ prakaraṇārambhaḥ ||
T06sthtvbhu:22: ātmā jīvo jantur manujo māṇava ity evamādika ātmopacāraḥ skandhā dhātava āyatanāni rūpaṃ vedanā saṃjñā saṃskārā vijñānam ity evamādiko dharmopacāraḥ |
T06sthtvbhu:23: ayaṃ dviprakāro 'py upacāro vijñānapariṇāma eva na mukhye ātmani dharmeṣu ceti |
T06sthtvbhu:25: dharmāṇām ātmanaś ca vijñānapariṇāmād bahir abhāvāt |
T06sthtvbhu:29: tatrātmādivikalpavāsanāparipoṣād rūpādivikalpavāsanāparipoṣāc cālayavijñānād ātmādinirbhāso vikalpo rūpādinirbhāsaś cotpadyate |
T06sthtvbhu:30: (Tvbh_42) tam ātmādinirbhāsaṃ rūpādinirbhāsañ ca tasmād vikalpād
T06sthtvbhu:31: bahirbhūtam ivopādāyātmādyupacāro rūpādidharmopacāraś cānādikālikaḥ pravartate vināpi bāhyenātmanā dharmaiś ca |
T06sthtvbhu:33: yac ca yatra nāsti tat tatropacaryate |
T06sthtvbhu:35: evaṃ vijñānasvarūpe bahiś cātmadharmābhāvāt parikalpita evātmā dharmāś ca na tu paramārthataḥ santīti vijñānavad vijñeyam api dravyata evety ayam ekāntavādo nābhyupeyaḥ |
T06sthtvbhu:36: upacārasya ca nirādhārasyāsaṃbhavād avaśyaṃ vijñānapariṇāmo vastuto 'stīty
T06sthtvbhu:38: ataś cāyam abhyupagamo na yuktikṣamo vijñānam api vijñeyavat saṃvṛtita eva na paramārthata iti |
T06sthtvbhu:39: saṃvṛtito 'py abhāvaprasaṅgān na hi saṃvṛtir nirupādānā yujyate |
T06sthtvbhu:40: tasmād ayam ekāntavādo dviprakāro 'pi niryuktikatvāt tyājya ity
T06sthtvbhu:42: evañ ca sarvaṃ vijñeyaṃ parikalpitasvabhāvatvād vastuto na vidyate vijñānaṃ punaḥ pratītyasamutpannatvād dravyato 'stīty abhyupeyam |
T06sthtvbhu:44: katham etad gamyate vinā bāhyenārthena vijñānam evārthākāram utpadyata iti
T06sthtvbhu:45: | bāhyo hy arthaḥ svābhāsavijñānajanakatvena vijñānasyālambanapratyaya iṣyate na kāraṇatvamātreṇa samanantarādipratyayād viśeṣāprasaṅgāt |
T06sthtvbhu:47: na ca sañcitam avayavasaṃhatimātrād anyad vidyate |
T06sthtvbhu:49: tasmād vinaiva bāhyenārthena vijñānaṃ sañcitākāram utpadyate |
T06sthtvbhu:50: na ca paramāṇava eva saṃcitās tasyālambanaṃ paramāṇūnām atadākāratvāt |
T06sthtvbhu:51: na hy asañcitāvasthātaḥ sañcitāvasthāyāṃ paramāṇūnāṃ kaścid ātmātiśayaḥ |
T06sthtvbhu:52: tasmād asañcitavat sañcitā api paramāṇavo naivālambanam |
T06sthtvbhu:54: ekaika paramāṇur anyanirapekṣyo 'tīndriyo bahavas tu parasparāpekṣā indriyagrāhyāḥ |
T06sthtvbhu:55: teṣām api sāpekṣanirapekṣāvasthayor ātmātiśayābhāvād ekāntenendriyagrāhyatvam atīndriyatvaṃ vā |
T06sthtvbhu:56: yadi ca paramāṇava eva parasparāpekṣā vijñānasya viṣayībhavanti |
T06sthtvbhu:57: evaṃ sati yo 'yaṃ ghaṭakuḍyādyākārabhedo vijñāne sa na syāt praramāṇūnām
T06sthtvbhu:60: na ca paramāṇavaḥ stambhādivat paramārthataḥ santy|
T06sthtvbhu:62: tadanabhyupagame vā pūrvadakṣiṇāparottarādidigbhedo yaḥ sa paramāṇor na syāt |
T06sthtvbhu:63: tataś ca vijñānavat paramāṇor apy amūrtatvam adeśasthatvañ ca prasajyate |
T06sthtvbhu:64: evaṃ bāhyārthābhāvād vijñānam evārthākāram utpadyate svapnavijñānavad ity abhyupeyam |
T06sthtvbhu:66: na ca vartamānā vartamānajanakā utpadyamānāvasthāyām asattvāt |
T06sthtvbhu:67: (Tvbh_46) utpannāvasthāyāṃ vijñānasyāpi tadākāreṇotpannatvān na kiñcit kartavyam astīti manovijñānam apy anālambanam evotpadyate |
T06sthtvbhu:69: asaty ātmani mukhye dharmeṣu copacāro na yujyate |
T06sthtvbhu:70: upacāro hi triṣu satsu bhavati nānyatamābhāve mukhyapadārthe tatsadṛśe 'nyasmin
T06sthtvbhu:72: tad yathā mukhye 'gnau tatsadṛśe ca māṇavake
T06sthtvbhu:73: tayoś ca sādhāraṇe dharme kapilatve tīkṣṇatve vā saty agnir māṇavaka ity upacāraḥ kriyate
T06sthtvbhu:74: atra hy agnir māṇavaka iti jātir dravyaṃ vopacaryate |
T06sthtvbhu:76: tatra tāvan na jāteḥ sādhāraṇaṃ kapilatvaṃ tīkṣṇatvaṃ vā |
T06sthtvbhu:77: na ca sādhāraṇadharmābhāve māṇavake jāter upacāro yujyate 'tiprasaṅgāt |
T06sthtvbhu:78: ataddharmatve 'pi jātes tīkṣṇatvakapilatvayor jātyavinābhāvitvān māṇavake jātyupacāro bhaviṣyati
T06sthtvbhu:84: na hi yo 'gnes tīkṣṇo guṇaḥ kapilo vā sa eva māṇavake |
T06sthtvbhu:86: viśeṣasya svāśrayapratibaddhatvān na vināgniguṇenāgner māṇavake upacāro yuktaḥ |
T06sthtvbhu:88: evam apy agniguṇasyaiva tīkṣṇasya kapilasya vā māṇavakaguṇe tīkṣṇe kapile vā sādṛśyād upacāro yukto na tu māṇavake 'gner guṇasādṛśyenāsaṃbandhāt |
T06sthtvbhu:92: pradhāne hi guṇarūpeṇaiva jñānābhidhāne pravartete tatsvarūpāsaṃsparśāt |
T06sthtvbhu:95: padārthasvarūpaparicchittyupāyo 'stīty ataḥ pradhānasvarūpaviṣayajñānābhidhānābhāvān naiva mukhyaḥ padārtho 'stīty
T06sthtvbhu:97: evaṃ yāvac chabde saṃbandhābhāvāj jñānābhidhānābhāva evañ cābhidhānābhidheyābhāvān naiva mukhyaḥ padārtho 'sti |
T06sthtvbhu:98: api ca sarva evāyaṃ gauṇa eva na mukhyo 'sti |
T06sthtvbhu:99: gauṇo hi nāma yo yatrāvidyamānena rūpeṇa pravartate |
T06sthtvbhu:100: sarvaś ca śabdaḥ pradhāne 'vidyamānenaiva guṇarūpeṇa pravartate ato mukhyo nāsty eva |
T06sthtvbhu:101: tatra yad uktaṃ asaty ātmani mukhye dharmeṣu copacāro na yukta iti tad ayuktam |
T06sthtvbhu:102: vijñānapariṇāmaḥ kati prabheda iti na jñāyate |
T06sthtvbhu:105: yatrātmādyupacāro dharmopacāraś ca sa punar hetubhāvena phalabhāvena ca bhidyate |
T06sthtvbhu:107: | phalapariṇāmaḥ punar vipākavāsanāvṛttilābhād ālayavijñānasya pūrvakarmākṣepaparisamāptau yā nikāyasabhāgāntareṣv abhinirvṛttiḥ |
T06sthtvbhu:108: niṣyandavāsanāvṛttilābhāc ca yā pravṛttivijñānānāṃ kliṣṭasya ca manasa ālayavijñānād abhinirvṛttiḥ
T06sthtvbhu:109: tatra pravṛttivijñānaṃ kuśalākuśalam ālayavijñāne vipākavāsanāṃ niṣyandavāsanāñ cādhatte |
T06sthtvbhu:110: avyākṛtaṃ kliṣṭañ ca mano niṣyandavāsanām eva |
T06sthtvbhu:111: yo 'sau trividhaḥ pariṇāma ukto 'sāv api na jñāyate |
T06sthtvbhu:113: vipāko mananākhyaś ca vijñaptir viṣayasya ca |
T06sthtvbhu:116: sa eṣa trividhaḥ pariṇāmo vipākākhyo mananākhyo viṣayavijñaptyākhyaś ca |
T06sthtvbhu:120: tatsvarūpanirdeśam antareṇa na tat pratīyate ity ato yasya yat svarūpaṃ tad yathākramaṃ pradarśayann āha |
T06sthtvbhu:124: ālayākhyam ity ālayavijñānasaṃjñakaṃ yad vijñānaṃ sa vipākapariṇāmaḥ |
T06sthtvbhu:127: atha vālīyante upanibadhyante 'smin sarvadharmāḥ kāryabhāvena tad vālīyate upanibadhyate kāraṇabhāvena sarvadharmeṣv ity ālayaḥ |
T06sthtvbhu:131: yadi pravṛttivijñānavyatiriktam ālayavijñānam asti tato 'syālambanam ākāro vā vaktavyaḥ |
T06sthtvbhu:132: na hi nirālambanaṃ nirākāraṃ vā vijñānaṃ yujyate |
T06sthtvbhu:138: tatrādhyātmam upādānaṃ parikalpitasvabhāvābhiniveśavāsanā sādhiṣṭhānam indriyarūpaṃ nāma ca
T06sthtvbhu:141: asaṃviditaka upādir yasmin asaṃviditakā ca sthānavijñaptir yasmin tad ālayavijñānam asaṃviditakopādisthānavijñaptikam
T06sthtvbhu:144: tatsadbhāvād ālayavijñānenātmādivikalpo rūpādivikalpaś ca kāryatvenopātta iti tad vāsanātmādivikalpānāṃ rūpādivikalpānāñ copādir ity ucyate |
T06sthtvbhu:145: so 'sminn idaṃ tad iti pratisaṃvedanākāreṇāsaṃvidita ity atas tad asaṃviditakopādir ity ucyate
T06sthtvbhu:147: āśraya ātmabhāvaḥ sādhiṣṭhānam indriyarūpaṃ nāma ca |
T06sthtvbhu:148: tasya punar yad upādānam upagamanam ekayogakṣematvena tad upādiḥ |
T06sthtvbhu:150: ārūpyadhātau tu rūpavītarāgatvād rūpavipākānabhinirvṛtter nāmopādānam eva |
T06sthtvbhu:151: kin tu vāsanāvastham eva tatra rūpaṃ na vipākāvastham |
T06sthtvbhu:152: tat punar upādānam idantayā pratisaṃvedayitum aśakyam ity ato 'saṃvidita ity ucyate |
T06sthtvbhu:157: na ca nirodhasamāpattyādyavasthāsu vijñānaṃ naivāstīti śakyate pratipattum |
T06sthtvbhu:160: ity uktaṃ vijñānañ cāvaśyaṃ caittaiḥ saṃprayuktam ity ato vaktavyaṃ katamaiḥ katibhiś ca tebhyaḥ saṃprayujyate |
T06sthtvbhu:165: sadeti yāvad ālayavijñānaṃ tāvad ebhiḥ sparśamanaskāravedanāsaṃjñācetanākhyaiḥ pañcabhiḥ sarvatragair dharmair anvitam |
T06sthtvbhu:171: tasmin sati tatsamakālam evendriyasya sukhādivedanānukūlo yo vikāras tena (Tvbh_56)
T06sthtvbhu:172: sadṛśo viṣayasya sukhādivedanīyākāraparicchedo yaḥ sa sparśaḥ |
T06sthtvbhu:173: indriyaṃ punar yena viśeṣeṇa sukhaduḥkhādihetutvaṃ pratipadyate sa tasya vikāraḥ |
T06sthtvbhu:174: sparśaḥ punar indriyavikārasādṛśyenendriyaṃ spṛśatīndriyeṇa vā spṛśyata iti sparśa ucyate
T06sthtvbhu:178: evaṃ hy uktaṃ sūtre sukhavedanīyaṃ sparśaṃ pratītyotpadyate sukhaṃ veditam iti vistaraḥ |
T06sthtvbhu:183: cittadhāraṇaṃ punas tatraivālambane punaḥ punaś cittasyāvarjanam |
T06sthtvbhu:184: etac ca karma cittasantater ālambananiyamena viśiṣṭaṃ manaskāram adhikṛtyoktaṃ na tu yaḥ praticittakṣaṇaṃ tasya hi pratikṣaṇam eva vyāpāro na kṣaṇāntare |
T06sthtvbhu:191: śubhāśubhānāṃ karmaṇāṃ phalavipākaṃ pratyanubhavanty anenety anubhavaḥ |
T06sthtvbhu:199: tatra sukho 'nubhavo yasminn utpanne viyogecchā niruddhe ca punaḥ
T06sthtvbhu:201: duḥkho 'nubhavo yasminn utpanne viyogecchā niruddhe ca punar asaṃyogecchā |
T06sthtvbhu:202: aduḥkhāsukho yasminn utpanne niruddhe cobhyaṃ na jāyate |
T06sthtvbhu:206: tasyodgrahaṇaṃ nirūpaṇaṃ nīlam etan na pītam iti |
T06sthtvbhu:207: cetanā cittābhisaṃskāro manasaś ceṣṭā yasyāṃ satyām ālambanaṃ prati cetasaḥ praspanda iva bhavaty ayaskāntavaśād ayaḥpraspandavat |
T06sthtvbhu:208: vedanā trividhā sukhā duḥkhā aduḥkhāsukhā ca |
T06sthtvbhu:209: dharmāś catuḥ prakārāḥ kuśalā akuśalā anivṛtāvyākṛtā nivṛtāvyākṛtāś ca |
T06sthtvbhu:210: tatrālayavijñāne vid iti sāmānyopadeśena na vijñāyate tisṝṇāṃ vedanānāṃ katamā vedanā |
T06sthtvbhu:211: tathā tad api kiṃ kuśalam akuśalam anivṛtāvyākṛtaṃ nivṛtāvyākṛtam iti na vijñāyata ity ata āha |
T06sthtvbhu:215: upekṣaivālayavijñāne vedanā na sukhā na duḥkhā tayoḥ paricchinnālambanākāratvād rāgadveṣānuśayitatvāc ca |
T06sthtvbhu:224: yathālayavijñānam ekāntena vipāko 'paricchinnālambanākāraṃ sadā sparśādibhir anvitaṃ tatra copekṣaiva vedanānivṛtāvyākṛtañ ca tathā sparśādayo 'py ekāntena vipākā evāparicchinnālambanākārāś ca |
T06sthtvbhu:225: ātmānaṃ hitvetaraiś caturbhir ālayavijñānena ca nityam anugatās teṣu copekṣaiva vedanānivṛtāvyākṛtāś cālayavijñānavat |
T06sthtvbhu:226: na hi vipākena saṃprayuktānām avipākatvam aparicchinnālambanākāreṇa ca paricchinnālambanākāratvaṃ saṃbhavati |
T06sthtvbhu:228: kiṃ punas tad ālayavijñānam ekam abhinnam āsaṃsāram anuvartate |
T06sthtvbhu:230: na hi tad ekam abhinnam anuvartate kṣaṇikatvāt |
T06sthtvbhu:235: udakasamūhasya pūrvāparabhāgāvicchedena pravāha ogha ity ucyate |
T06sthtvbhu:236: yathā hy oghas tṛṇakāṣṭhagomayādīn ākarṣayaṅ gacchaty evam ālayavijñānam api puṇyāpuṇyāneñjyakarmavāsanānugataṃ sparśamanaskārādīn ākarṣan srotasāsaṃsāram avyuparataṃ pravartata iti |
T06sthtvbhu:237: tasyaivaṃ śrotasā pravṛttasya kasyām avasthāyāṃ vyāvṛttir ity āha |
T06sthtvbhu:242: kasya punar yogād arhann ity ucyate |
T06sthtvbhu:244: tasyāṃ hy avasthāyām ālayavijñānāśritadauṣṭhulyaniravaśeṣaprahāṇād ālayavijñānaṃ vyāvṛttaṃ bhavati |
T06sthtvbhu:249: tatra yathā cakṣurādivijñānānāṃ cakṣurādaya āśrayatvena rūpādayaś cālambanatvena prasiddhā naiva kliṣṭasya manasa āśraya ālambanaṃ vā prasiddham |
T06sthtvbhu:250: na ca vijñānam āśrayālambananirapekṣaṃ yujyata ity ataḥ kliṣṭasya manasa āśrayālambanapratipādanārthaṃ niruktipratipādanārthañ cāha |
T06sthtvbhu:253: tad āśritya pravartata iti tacchabdenālayavijñānam abhisaṃbadhyate |
T06sthtvbhu:254: tadvāsanāśrayo hy ālayavijñānam atas tad āśritya pravartate santānenotpadyata ity arthaḥ |
T06sthtvbhu:255: atha vā yasmin dhātau bhūmau vālayavijñānaṃ vipākas tad api kliṣṭaṃ manas taddhātukaṃ tadbhūmikaṃ ceti tatpratibaddhavṛttitvāt tad āśritya pravartate |
T06sthtvbhu:256: tadālambam ity ālayavijñānālambanam eva satkāyadṛṣṭyādibhiḥ saṃprayogād ahaṃ mamety ālayavijñānālambanatvāt
T06sthtvbhu:257: kathaṃ punar yata eva cittād utpadyate tad eva tadālambanaṃ bhavati |
T06sthtvbhu:258: yathā tad anicchatāṃ keṣāṃcit kasyāñcid avasthāyāṃ yata eva cittān manovijñānam utpadyate tadālambanam eva tad utpadyate |
T06sthtvbhu:259: manonāma vijñānam iti mana iti nāma ākhyā yasya vijñānasya tad ālayavijñānam āśritya pravarte tadālambanaṃ ca manonāmety anenālayavijñānāt pravṛttivijñānāc ca vyavacchinatti |
T06sthtvbhu:260: tat punaḥ kiṃ svabhāvam ity āha |
T06sthtvbhu:262: evaṃ mananātmakatvān mana ity ucyate nairūktena vidhinā |
T06sthtvbhu:264: idaṃ tu na jñāyate katamais tac caittaiḥ kiyadbhiḥ kiyantaṃ kālaṃ vā saṃprayujyata ity ata āha |
T06sthtvbhu:267: caittā hi dviprakārāḥ kleśās tad anye ca |
T06sthtvbhu:270: na ca taiḥ saṃprayujyate 'taś caturbhir ity āha |
T06sthtvbhu:275: na hi nivṛtena vijñānenākuśalānāṃ saṃprayogaḥ saṃbhavati |
T06sthtvbhu:279: yāvat tad asti tāvat taiḥ saṃprayuktam |
T06sthtvbhu:280: sāmānyanirdeśād viśeṣato na jñāyanta iti viśeṣato nirdiśati |
T06sthtvbhu:282: upādānaskandheṣv ātmeti darśanam ātmadṛṣṭiḥ satkāyadṛṣṭir ity arthaḥ |
T06sthtvbhu:288: tatrālayavijñānasvarūpe saṃmūḍhaḥ sann ālayavijñāne ātmadṛṣṭim utpādayati
T06sthtvbhu:290: etasmiṃs traye saty ātmābhimate vastuni yo 'bhiṣvaṅgaḥ sa ātmasnehaḥ |
T06sthtvbhu:294: viparyāsanimittaṃ tu manaḥ kliṣṭaṃ sadaiva tat |
T06sthtvbhu:296: ete hy ātmamohādayaḥ kleśā manovan navabhūmikāḥ |
T06sthtvbhu:297: iha ca sāmānyenābhidhānān na jñāyate kiṃ svabhūmikair eva saṃprayujyate |
T06sthtvbhu:302: tanmayair iti yatra dhātau bhūmau vā jātas taddhātukais tadbhūmikair eva ca saṃprayujyate
T06sthtvbhu:304: kiṃ punaś caturbhir eva kleśaiḥ saṃprayujyate |
T06sthtvbhu:311: ete hi pañca dharmāḥ sarvatragatvāt sarvavijñānaiḥ saṃprayujyante |
T06sthtvbhu:312: etair api yatra jātas tanmayair eva saṃprayujyate nānyadhātubhūmikaiḥ |
T06sthtvbhu:316: yadi tat kliṣṭaṃ manaḥ kuśalakliṣṭāvyākṛtāvasthāsv aviśeṣeṇa pravartate na tasya tarhi nivṛttir asti |
T06sthtvbhu:317: anivṛtte ca tasmin kuto mokṣa iti kathaṃ na mokṣābhāvaḥ prasajyate |
T06sthtvbhu:318: na prasajyate yasmād arhato na tat |
T06sthtvbhu:319: na nirodhasamāpattau mārge lokottare na ca || 7bcd
T06sthtvbhu:320: arhatas tāvad aśeṣakleśaprahāṇāt kliṣṭaṃ mano naivāsti |
T06sthtvbhu:323: ākiñcanyāyatanavītarāgasyāpy anāgāmino nirodhasamāpattilābhino mārgabalena nirodhasamāpatter labhyatvāṃ mārgavan nirodhasamāpattyavasthāyām api nirudhyate |
T06sthtvbhu:324: nirodhāc ca vyutthitasya punar ālayavijñānād eva pravartate |
T06sthtvbhu:327: laukike tu mārge kliṣṭaṃ manaḥ pravartata eva |
T06sthtvbhu:330: tasmād api vyutthitasya punar ālayavijñānād evotpadyate |
T06sthtvbhu:333: dvitīyapariṇāmāntaraṃ tṛtīyaḥ pariṇāmo vaktavya ity ata āha |
T06sthtvbhu:337: ṣaḍvidhasyeti ṣaṭprakārasya rūpaśabdagandharasaspraṣṭavya dharmātmakasya viṣayasya yā upalabdhir grahaṇaṃ pratipattir ity arthaḥ |
T06sthtvbhu:338: sā punaḥ kiṃ kuśalākuśalāvyākṛtety ata āha |
T06sthtvbhu:343: kuśalākuśalair asaṃprayuktādvayā na kuśalā nākuśalety arthaḥ |
T06sthtvbhu:345: kiyanto vā tatsaṃprayogiṇaś caitasikā ity ata āha |
T06sthtvbhu:348: ya ete sarvatragādaya uddiṣṭās te na vijñāyanta ity atas tatpradarśanārtham āha |
T06sthtvbhu:350: ādau nirdiṣṭatvād ādyāḥ sarvatragā ity arthaḥ |
T06sthtvbhu:355: te punaḥ sparśamanaskārādayaḥ pañca dharmāḥ sarvacittam anugacchantīti sarvatragāḥ
T06sthtvbhu:356: | tathā hy eta ālayavijñāne kliṣṭe manasi pravṛttivijñāneṣu cāviśeṣeṇa pravartante |
T06sthtvbhu:361: eṣāṃ hi viśeṣa eva viṣayo na sarvaḥ |
T06sthtvbhu:363: abhiprete vastuny abhilāṣa iti pratiniyataviṣayatvaṃ jñāpitaṃ bhavaty anabhiprete chandābhāvāt
T06sthtvbhu:364: darśanaśravaṇādikriyāviṣayatvena yad abhimataṃ vastu tad abhipretam |
T06sthtvbhu:369: yuktita āptopadeśato vā yad vastu asaṃdigdhaṃ tan niścitam |
T06sthtvbhu:370: yenaivākāreṇa tan niścitam anityaduḥkhādyākāreṇa tenaivākāreṇa tasya vastunaś cetasy abhiniveśanam
T06sthtvbhu:373: adhimuktipradhāno hi svasiddhāntāt parapravādibhir apahartuṃ na śakyate |
T06sthtvbhu:377: pūrvagṛhītasya vastunaḥ punaḥ punar ālambanākārasmaraṇam abhilapanatā |
T06sthtvbhu:380: ālambanābhilapane sati cittasyālambanāntara ākārāntare vā vikṣepābhāvād avikṣepakarmikā |
T06sthtvbhu:387: sāpy upaparīkṣya eva vastuni pravicayo yogāyogavihito
T06sthtvbhu:390: yaḥ samyaṅ mithyā vā saṃkīrṇasvasāmānyalakṣaṇeṣv iva dharmeṣu vivekāvabodhaḥ |
T06sthtvbhu:393: tena triprakāreṇa yogena yo janitaḥ sa yogavihitaḥ |
T06sthtvbhu:394: sa punaḥ śrutamayaś cintāmayo bhāvanāmayaś ca |
T06sthtvbhu:400: upapattipratilambhiko laukikavyavahārāvabodhaś ca na yogavihito nāyogavihitaḥ |
T06sthtvbhu:402: saṃśayavyāvartanaṃ prajñayā dharmān pravicinvato niścayalābhād iti |
T06sthtvbhu:403: ete hi pañca dharmāḥ parasparaṃ vyatiricyāpi pravartante |
T06sthtvbhu:404: evañ ca yatrādhimokṣas tatra nāvaśyam itarair api bhavitavyam |
T06sthtvbhu:407: tadanantaroddiṣṭās tv idānīṃ kuśalā vaktavyā ity ata āha |
T06sthtvbhu:412: tatra śraddhā astitvaguṇavattvaśakyatveṣu karmaphalasatyaratneṣv abhisaṃpratyayaḥ prasādaś cetaso 'bhilāṣaḥ |
T06sthtvbhu:414: | sati vastuni guṇavaty aguṇavati vā saṃpratyayākārā |
T06sthtvbhu:416: sati guṇavati ca prāptum utpādayituṃ vā śakye 'bhilāṣākārā |
T06sthtvbhu:418: śraddhā hi cittakāluṣyavairodhikīty atas tatsaṃprayoge kleśopakleśamalakāluṣyavigamāc cittaṃ śraddhām āgamya prasīdatīti cetasaḥ prasāda ucyate |
T06sthtvbhu:420: hrīr ātmānaṃ dharmaṃ vādhipatiṃ kṛtvāvadyena lajjā |
T06sthtvbhu:421: sadbhir garhitatvād aniṣṭavipākatvāc ca pāpam evāvadyam |
T06sthtvbhu:422: tenāvadyena kṛtenākṛtena vā yā cittasyāvalīnatā lajjā sā hrīḥ |
T06sthtvbhu:425: loke hy etad garhitaṃ māṃ caivaṃ karmāṇaṃ viditvā garhiṣyatīty aślokādibhayād avadyena lajjate
T06sthtvbhu:428: lobho nāma bhave bhavopakaraṇeṣu ca yāsaktiḥ prārthanā ca |
T06sthtvbhu:433: dveṣo hi sattveṣu duḥkhe duḥkhasthānīyeṣu ca dharmeṣv āghātaḥ |
T06sthtvbhu:434: adveṣo dveṣapratipakṣatvāt sattveṣu duḥkhe duḥkhasthānīyeṣu ca dharmeṣv anāghātaḥ |
T06sthtvbhu:438: mohapratipakṣatvād amohas teṣv eva karmaphalasatyaratneṣu saṃpratipattiḥ |
T06sthtvbhu:449: cittakarmaṇyatā samyaṅmanasikārasaṃprayuktasya cittasyāhlādalāghavanimittaṃ yac caitasikaṃ dharmāntaraṃ yadyogāc cittam avyāhatam ālambane pravartate 'tas tac cittakarmaṇyatety ucyate kāyasya punaḥ spraṣṭavyaviśeṣa eva prītyāhṛtaḥ kāyapraśrabdhir veditavyā |
T06sthtvbhu:450: prītamanasaḥ kāyaḥ praśrabhyata iti sūtre vacanāt |
T06sthtvbhu:457: ekāntakuśalatvāt sarvakuśalānāṃ ceha nirdeśādhikārāc chraddhādivat sākṣād anirdeśāt tadvyatiriktānyakuśalābhāvāc copekṣaiva vijñāyate |
T06sthtvbhu:460: yān alobhādīn niśrityākuśalān dharmān prajahāti tatpratipakṣāṃś ca kuśalān dharmān bhāvayati te 'lobhādayo 'pramādaḥ |
T06sthtvbhu:464: ebhis tribhiḥ (Tvbh_82) padair upekṣāyā ādimadhyāvasānāvasthā dyotitā |
T06sthtvbhu:468: 'nabhisaṃskāreṇāprayatvena samāhitasya cetaso yathāyogaṃ samasyaiva yā pravṛttiḥ sā cittapraśaṭhatā
T06sthtvbhu:470: tato bhāvanāprakarṣagamanāt tadvipakṣadūrībhāvāt tacchaṅkābhāve layauddhatyapratipakṣanimitteṣv ābhogam akurvato 'nābhogāvasthā cittasyānābhogatā |
T06sthtvbhu:473: vadhabandhanādibhiḥ sattvānām aviheṭhanam avihiṃsā sattveṣu karuṇā |
T06sthtvbhu:475: kam iti sukhasyākhyā sukhaṃ ruṇaddhīty arthaḥ |
T06sthtvbhu:479: tadanantaroddiṣṭās tu kleśā ity atas tān adhikṛtyāha |
T06sthtvbhu:483: rāgaś ca pratighaś ca mūḍhiś ca rāgapratighamūḍhayaḥ |
T06sthtvbhu:484: tatra rāgo bhavabhogayor adhyavasānaṃ prārthanā ca |
T06sthtvbhu:488: pratighaḥ sattveṣv āghātaḥ sattveṣu rūkṣacittatā yenāviṣṭaḥ sattvānāṃ vadhabandhanādikam anarthañ cintayati |
T06sthtvbhu:495: cittānuvidhānāc ca kāyo 'pi tapyata eveti sarveryāpatheṣu
T06sthtvbhu:497: pratihatacittasya ca na kiñcid duścaritaṃ vidūra iti pratigho 'sparśavihāraduścaritasaṃniśrayadānakarmaka
T06sthtvbhu:499: moho 'pāyeṣu sugatau nirvāṇe tatpratiṣṭhāpākeṣu hetuṣu teṣāṃ cāviparīte
T06sthtvbhu:507: māno hi nāma sarva eva satkāyadṛṣṭisamāśrayeṇa pravartate |
T06sthtvbhu:509: tathā hy ātmātmīyabhāvaṃ skandheṣv adhyāropyāyam aham idaṃ mamety ātmānaṃ tena tena viśeṣeṇonnamayati
T06sthtvbhu:512: agauravaṃ guruṣu guṇavatsu ca pudgaleṣu stabdhatā kāyavācor apraśrititā duḥkhotpattiḥ punar atra punarbhavotpattiḥ |
T06sthtvbhu:513: sa ca punaś cittonnatisvarūpābhede 'pi cittonnatinimittabhedāt saptadhā bhidyate |
T06sthtvbhu:515: hīnāt kulavijñānavittādibhiḥ śreyān asmi kulavijñānavittādibhir iti yā cittasyonnatiḥ sadṛśena vā kulādibhir eva sadṛśo 'smīti yā cittasyonnatiḥ sa mānaḥ |
T06sthtvbhu:517: kulavijñānavittādibhiḥ sadṛśāt tyāgaśīlapauruṣādibhiḥ śreyān asmi śreyasā vā kulavidyādibhiḥ sadṛśo 'smi vijñānavittādibhir ity ayam
T06sthtvbhu:519: śreyasaḥ kulavijñānavittair aham eva śreyān asmi kulavijñānavittair iti yā cittasyonnatir ayaṃ mānātimānaḥ |
T06sthtvbhu:521: pañcasūpādānaskandheṣv ātmātmīyarahiteṣv ātmātmīyābhiniveśād yā cittasyonnatiḥ so 'smimānaḥ
T06sthtvbhu:523: aprāpta uttare viśeṣādhigame prāpto mayeti yā cittasyonnatiḥ so 'bhimānaḥ |
T06sthtvbhu:526: kulavidyādibhir iti yā cittasyonnatir ayam ūnamānaḥ |
T06sthtvbhu:528: aguṇavato guṇavān asmīti yā cittasyonnatiḥ sa mithyāmānaḥ |
T06sthtvbhu:529: aguṇā hi dauḥśīlyādayas te yasya vidyante so 'guṇavān |
T06sthtvbhu:530: tasmād guṇavān asmīty anena hi dānaśīlādyabhāve 'pi guṇavattvam abhyupagataṃ bhavatīty
T06sthtvbhu:532: dṛg iti sāmānyanirdeśe 'pi kleśādhikārāt pañcaiva kleśātmikāḥ
T06sthtvbhu:535: āsāṃ tu kliṣṭanitīraṇākāratvād aviśeṣe 'py ālambanākārabhedāt parasparato bhedaḥ |
T06sthtvbhu:537: antagrāhadṛṣṭis teṣv eva pañcasūpādānaskandheṣv ātmātmīyatvena gṛhīteṣu yad ucchedataḥ śāśvatato vā darśanam |
T06sthtvbhu:539: yayā mithyādṛṣṭyā hetuṃ vāpavadati phalaṃ kriyāṃ vā sad vā vastu nāśayati sā sarvadarśanapāpatvān mithyādṛṣṭir ity ucyate |
T06sthtvbhu:540: dṛṣṭaparāmarśaḥ pañcasūpādānaskandheṣv agrato viśiṣṭataḥ śreṣṭhataḥ paramataś ca yad darśanam
T06sthtvbhu:541: śilavrataparāmarśaḥ pañcasūpādānaskandheṣu śuddhito muktito nairyāṇikataś ca yad darśanam
T06sthtvbhu:544: vividhā matir vimatiḥ syān na syād iti |
T06sthtvbhu:546: uktāḥ ṣaṭkleśās tadanantaroddiṣṭās tv idānīm upakleśā vaktavyā ity ata āha
T06sthtvbhu:548: mrakṣaḥ pradāśa īrṣyātha mātsaryaṃ saha māyayā || 12bcd
T06sthtvbhu:550: āśraddhyam atha kausīdyaṃ pramādo muṣitā smṛtiḥ || 13
T06sthtvbhu:551: vikṣepo 'saṃprajanyañ ca kaukṛtyaṃ middham eva ca |
T06sthtvbhu:552: vitarkaś ca vicāraś cety upakleśā dvaye dvidhā || 14
T06sthtvbhu:553: tatra krodho vartamānam apakāram āgamya yaś cetasa āghātaḥ |
T06sthtvbhu:555: kiṃ tv asya pratighasyāvasthāviśeṣe prajñaptatvāt pratighāṃśikaḥ |
T06sthtvbhu:556: vartamānam apakāram āgamya yaś cetasa āghātaḥ sattvāsattvaviṣayo daṇḍadānādisaṃniśrayadānakarmakaś ca sa krodha iti prajñapyate |
T06sthtvbhu:558: krodhād ūrdhvaṃ mamānenedam apakṛtam ity asya vairātmakasyānuśayasyānutsargaḥ prabandhena pravartanam upanāhaḥ |
T06sthtvbhu:564: chandadveṣabhayādīn nirākṛtya kāle taddhitaiṣiṇā codakena tat tvam evaṃkārīty anuyuktasya mohāṃśiky avadyapracchādanā mrakṣaḥ |
T06sthtvbhu:567: (Tvbh_92) dharmataiṣā yad avadyaṃ pracchādayataḥ kaukṛtyam utpadyate kaukṛtyāc cāvaśyaṃ
T06sthtvbhu:575: ayañ ca krodhopanāhapūrvakaś cetasa āghātasvabhāva iti pratighāṃśika eva na dravyato vidyate
T06sthtvbhu:579: lābhasatkārādhyavasitasya lābhasatkārakulaśīlaśrutādīn guṇaviśeṣān parasyopalabhya dveṣāṃśiko 'marṣakṛtaś cetaso vyāroṣa īrṣyā |
T06sthtvbhu:583: upāttaṃ vastu dharmāmiṣakauśalātmakaṃ yena pūjānugrahakāmyayārthine 'narthine vā dīyate tad dānam |
T06sthtvbhu:585: lābhasatkārādhyavasitasya jīvitopakaraṇeṣu rāgāṃśikaś cetasa āgraho 'parityāgecchā mātsaryam
T06sthtvbhu:587: asaṃlekhaḥ punar mātsaryeṇānupayujyamānānām apy upakaraṇānāṃ saṃnicayād veditavyaḥ |
T06sthtvbhu:590: iyañ ca sahitābhyāṃ rāgamohābhyām abhūtān guṇān prakāśayatas tayoḥ samuditayoḥ prajñapyata iti krodhādivat prajñaptita eva na dravyata iti mithyājīvasaṃniśrayadānakarmikā |
T06sthtvbhu:593: tat punar anyenānyat pratisaran vikṣipaty aparisphuṭaṃ vā pratipadyate |
T06sthtvbhu:595: sa hi sphuṭam eva pracchādayati na kākvā |
T06sthtvbhu:596: idam api lābhasatkārādhyavasitopāyābhyāṃ rāgamohābhyāṃ svadoṣapracchādanārthaṃ paravyāmohanāya pravartate |
T06sthtvbhu:599: samyagavavādasya yo lābho yoniśo manasikāras tasyāntarāyaṃ karoti |
T06sthtvbhu:603: yena harṣaviśeṣeṇa cittam asvatantrīkriyate tena tadātmatantrīkaraṇāt paryāttaṃ bhavatīty etad uktañ cetasaḥ paryādānam iti |
T06sthtvbhu:607: viheṭhyante 'nayā sattvā vadhabandhanādibhir duḥkhadaurmanasyotpādanād iti sattvaviheṭhanā
T06sthtvbhu:608: sā punaḥ pratighāṃśikī nirghṛṇatā sattveṣu cittarūkṣatā sattvaviheṭhanakarmikā vihiṃsety ucyate
T06sthtvbhu:610: tasmin karmaṇyātmānam ayogyaṃ manyamānasyāpi yāvadyenālajjā sāhrīkyaṃ hrīvipakṣabhūtam |
T06sthtvbhu:612: lokaśāstraviruddham etan mayā kriyata ity evam avagacchato 'pi yā tayā pāpakriyayālajjā sāpatrāpyavipakṣabhūtam anapatrāpyam |
T06sthtvbhu:614: rāgadveṣamohaprakāreṣu sarvāsatkāryaprabhavahetuṣu rāgadveṣayor ayaugapadyād yathāsaṃbhavaṃ prajñapyate na tu svatantram asti |
T06sthtvbhu:616: stimitasya bhāvaḥ staimityaṃ yadyogāc cittaṃ jaḍībhavati stimitaṃ bhavati nālambanaṃ pratipattuṃ samutsahate |
T06sthtvbhu:618: mohāṃśe prajñaptatvāc ca mohāṃśikam eva na pṛthag vidyate |
T06sthtvbhu:622: sa punar eṣa rāgānukūlaṃ pūrvahasitarasitakrīḍitādyanusmarataś cetaso 'vyupaśamahetuḥ
T06sthtvbhu:631: kuśale kāyavāṅmanaḥkarmaṇi nidrāpārśvaśayanasukham āgamya yo mohāṃśikaś cetaso
T06sthtvbhu:634: pramādo yair lobhadveṣamohakausīdyaiḥ kleśād rāgadveṣamohādikāc cittaṃ na rakṣati kaśalaṃ ca tatpratipakṣabhūtaṃ na bhāvayati |
T06sthtvbhu:643: yai rāgadveṣamohaiś cittaṃ samādhyālambanād bahiḥ kṣipyate teṣu yathāsaṃbhavaṃ vikṣepaḥ prajñapyate
T06sthtvbhu:645: asaṃprajanyaṃ kleśasaṃprayuktā prajñā yayāsaṃviditā kāyavākcittacaryā abhikramapratikramādiṣu vartate karaṇīyākaraṇīyājñānāt |
T06sthtvbhu:650: iha tu kukṛtaviṣayaś cetaso vilekhaḥ kaukṛtyaṃ caitasikādhikārāt |
T06sthtvbhu:654: sāsvatantrā cetaso yato bhavati tan middham |
T06sthtvbhu:655: kāyasandhāraṇāsamarthā vā vṛttiś cetaso 'svatantrā sā yato bhavati tan middham |
T06sthtvbhu:657: etac ca mohāṃśe prajñapanān mohāṃśikaṃ kṛtyātipattisaṃniśrayadānakarmakañ ca |
T06sthtvbhu:663: cetanāprajñāviśeṣa iti cetanāyāś cittaparispandātmakatvāt prajñāyāś ca guṇadoṣavivekākāratvāt
T06sthtvbhu:664: tadvaśena cittapravṛtteḥ kadācic cittacetanayor vitarkaḥ prajñaptiḥ kadācit prajñācetasor yathākramam anabhyūhābhyuhāvasthayoḥ |
T06sthtvbhu:665: atha vā cetanāprajñayor eva vitarkaḥ prajñaptis tadvaśena cittasya tathāpravṛttatvāt |
T06sthtvbhu:678: ete ca catvāro dharmā dvidhā kliṣṭā akliṣṭāś ca |
T06sthtvbhu:679: tatrākuśalam akṛtvā kuśalañ ca kṛtvā yaś cetaso vilekhas tat saṃkliṣṭaṃ kaukṛtyam |
T06sthtvbhu:680: yat kuśalam akṛtvākuśalañ ca kṛtvā tat kaukṛtyam akliṣṭam |
T06sthtvbhu:681: middham api kliṣṭacittāviddhaṃ kliṣṭacittasaṃprayuktaṃ ca kliṣṭam |
T06sthtvbhu:687: tatra ye kaukṛtyamiddhavitarkavicārāḥ kliṣṭās ta evopakleśā netare |
T06sthtvbhu:688: tatra yathā rūpaśabdādyupalabdhiḥ ṣaṭprakārā yathāsaṃbhavaṃ sarvaiś caitasikaiḥ saṃprayujyate sarvatragair viniyataiḥ kuśalaiḥ kleśair upakleśaiś ca evaṃ trivedanā tisṛbhiś ca vedanābhiḥ saṃprayujyate sukhayā duḥkhayā aduḥkhāsukhayā ca |
T06sthtvbhu:689: saumanasyadaurmanasyopekṣāsthānīyeṣu rūpādiṣu tadutpatteḥ kuśalā akuśalā avyākṛtā ca |
T06sthtvbhu:690: ālayavijñānan tu sarvatragaiḥ pañcabhir eva saṃprayujyate nānyaiḥ |
T06sthtvbhu:692: kliṣṭaṃ manaḥ sarvatragaiḥ pañcabhiś caturbhiś ca kleśair ātmamohādibhiḥ sadā saṃprayujyate
T06sthtvbhu:695: kiṃ pañcānāñ cakṣurvijñānādīnāṃ yugapad ālambanapratyayasānnidhye 'py ālayavijñānād ekasyaivotpattir bhavati na dvayor na bahūnāṃ vā |
T06sthtvbhu:697: na dvayor na bahūnāṃ vā yugapat samanantarapratyayābhāvād ekasyaiva vijñānasyotpattir bhavati
T06sthtvbhu:698: na caikaṃ vijñānaṃ bahūnāṃ samantarapratyayatvaṃ pratipattum utsahate |
T06sthtvbhu:701: evaṃ dvayor bahūnāñ ca pratyayasāṃnidhye utpattir bhavatīty ata āha |
T06sthtvbhu:703: vijñānānāṃ saha na vā taraṅgāṇāṃ yathā jale || 15
T06sthtvbhu:705: pañcānāṃ cakṣurādivijñānānāṃ bījāśrayatvāt tadutpatter gatiṣu janmopādānāc cālayavijñānaṃ mūlavijñānam ity ucyate |
T06sthtvbhu:706: yathāpratyayam udbhava iti yasya yasya yaḥ pratyayaḥ saṃnihitas tasya tasya niyamenodbhava ātmalābhaḥ |
T06sthtvbhu:707: saha na veti yugapat krameṇa vā |
T06sthtvbhu:708: taraṅgāṇāṃ yathā jala ity ālayavijñānāt pravṛttivijñānānāṃ yugapad ayugapac cotpattau dṛṣṭāntaḥ
T06sthtvbhu:710: tadyathā viśālamate mahata udakaughasya vahataḥ saced ekasya taraṅgasyotpattipratyayaḥ pratyupasthito bhavaty ekam eva taraṅgaṃ pravartate |
T06sthtvbhu:711: saced dvayos trayāṇāṃ saṃbahulānāṃ taraṅgāṇām utpattipratyayaḥ pratyupasthito bhavati yāvat saṃbahulāni taraṅgāṇi pravartante |
T06sthtvbhu:712: na ca tasyodakaughasya srotasā vahataḥ samucchittir bhavati |
T06sthtvbhu:714: evam eva viśālamate tadoghasthānīyam ālayavijñānaṃ saṃniśritya pratiṣṭhāya saced ekasya cakṣurvijñānasyotpattipratyayaḥ pratyupasthito bhavaty ekam eva cakṣurvijñānaṃ pravartate |
T06sthtvbhu:715: saced dvayos trayāṇāṃ sacet pañcānāṃ vijñānānām utpattipratyayaḥ pratyupasthito bhavati sakṛd yāvat pañcānāṃ pravṛttir bhavati |
T06sthtvbhu:717: ādānavijñāna gabhīrasūkṣmo ogho yathā vartati sarvabījo |
T06sthtvbhu:718: bālāna eṣo mayi na prakāśi mā haiva ātmā parikalpayeyur iti |
T06sthtvbhu:721: ata ekasmād api samanantarapratyayād ālambanapratyayasānnidhye dvayor bahūnāṃ vā vijñānānām utpattir na virūdhyate |
T06sthtvbhu:722: kiñ cātra kāraṇaṃ yat samanantarapratyayapratiniyamābhāve pañcānāñ ca yugapad ālambanapratyayasānnidhya ekenaivotpattavyaṃ na pañcabhir apīti |
T06sthtvbhu:723: tasmād alambanasadbhāve pañcānām api cotpattir ity abhyupeyam |
T06sthtvbhu:725: kiṃ manovijñānaṃ cakṣurādivijñānaiḥ saha pravartate vinā ca |
T06sthtvbhu:730: sarvadeti sarvakālaṃ cakṣurādivijñānaiḥ saha vinā cety arthaḥ |
T06sthtvbhu:732: āsaṃjñikād ṛte samāpattidvayān middhān mūrcchanād apy acittakād iti |
T06sthtvbhu:733: tatrāsaṃjñikam asaṃjñisattveṣu deveṣūpapannasya yaś cittacaitasikānāṃ dharmāṇāṃ nirodhaḥ |
T06sthtvbhu:736: tṛtīyād dhyānād vītarāgasyordhvam avītarāgasya niḥsaraṇasaṃjñāpūrvakeṇa manasikāreṇa manovijñānasya tatsaṃprayuktānāñ ca caittānāṃ yo nirodhaḥ so 'trāsaṃjñisamāpattir ity ucyate |
T06sthtvbhu:741: sa ca samāpatticittād anantarañ cittāntarotpattiviruddha āśrayaḥ prāpyata iti samāpattir ity ucyate |
T06sthtvbhu:742: nirodhasamāpattir ākiñcanyāyatanavītarāgasya śāntavihārasaṃjñāpūrvakeṇa manasikāreṇa sasaṃprayogasya manovijñānasya kliṣṭasya ca manaso yo nirodhaḥ |
T06sthtvbhu:744: acittakaṃ middhaṃ gāḍhamiddhopahatatvād āśrayasya tāvatkālaṃ manovijñānāpravṛtter acittakam ity ucyate |
T06sthtvbhu:746: āgantukenābhighātena vātapittaśleṣmavaiṣamyeṇa vā yad āśrayavaiṣamyaṃ manovijñānapravṛttiviruddhaṃ tatrācittikā mūrcchopacaryate |
T06sthtvbhu:747: etāḥ pañcāvasthā varjayitvā tadanyāsu sarvāsv avasthāsu manovijñānapravṛttir veditavyā |
T06sthtvbhu:748: evam āsaṃjñikādiṣu manovijñāne niruddhe tadapagame punaḥ kuta utpadyate yatas tasya kālakriyā na bhavati |
T06sthtvbhu:751: yatra vijñānapariṇāme ātmadharmopacāraḥ sa punas tridhety uddiśya vistareṇa trividho 'pi nirdiṣṭaḥ
T06sthtvbhu:752: idānīm ātmadharmopacāro yaḥ pravartate sa vijñānapariṇāma eva na vijñānapariṇāmāc ca pṛthag asty ātmā dharmā ceti yat pratijñātaṃ tatprasādhanārtham āha |
T06sthtvbhu:754: tena tan nāsti tenedaṃ sarvaṃ vijñāptimātrakam || 17
T06sthtvbhu:761: tena trividhena vikalpenālayavijñānakliṣṭamanaḥpravṛttivijñānasvabhāvena sasaṃprayogeṇa yad vikalpyate bhājanam ātmāskandhadhātvāyatanarūpaśabdādikaṃ vastu tan nāstīty ataḥ sa vijñānapariṇāmo vikalpa ucyate |
T06sthtvbhu:763: kathaṃ punar etad vijñāyate tadālambanam asad iti |
T06sthtvbhu:764: yad dhi yasya kāraṇaṃ tasmin samagre cāviruddhe ca tad utpadyate nānyathā |
T06sthtvbhu:765: vijñānañ ca māyāgandharvanagarasvapnatimirādāv asaty apyālambane jāyate |
T06sthtvbhu:766: yadi ca vijñānasyālambanapratibaddha utpādaḥ syād evaṃ sati māyādiṣv arthābhāvān na vijñānam utpadyate |
T06sthtvbhu:767: tasmāt pūrvakān niruddhāt tajjātīyavijñānād vijñānam utpadyate |
T06sthtvbhu:768: na bāhyād arthāt tasminn asaty api bhāvāt |
T06sthtvbhu:769: dṛṣṭā cābhinne 'py arthe pratipattṝṇāṃ parasparaviruddhā pratipattiḥ |
T06sthtvbhu:771: tasmād adhyāropitarūpatvād vikalpasyālambanam asad iti pratipattavyam |
T06sthtvbhu:776: yasmāt pariṇāmātmakena vikalpena yad vikalpyate tena tan nāsti tasmād viṣayābhāvāt sarvaṃ vijñaptimātrakam |
T06sthtvbhu:780: yadi sarvaṃ vijñaptimātrakam eva na tato 'nyaḥ kartā karaṇaṃ vāsti kathaṃ mūlavijñānād anadhiṣṭhitād asati karaṇe vikalpāḥ pravartanta ity āha |
T06sthtvbhu:781: sarvabījaṃ hi vijñānaṃ pariṇāmas tathā tathā |
T06sthtvbhu:782: yāty anyonyavaśād yena vikalpaḥ sa sa jāyate || 18
T06sthtvbhu:783: tatra sarvadharmotpādanaśaktyanugamāt sarvabījaṃ vijñānam ity ālayavijñānam |
T06sthtvbhu:784: vijñānaṃ hy asarvabījam apy astīty ataḥ sarvabījam ity āha
T06sthtvbhu:785: | vijñānād anyad api kaiścit pradhānādi sarvabījaṃ kalpyata iti vijñānam
T06sthtvbhu:789: pariṇāmas tathā tathā yāty anyonyavaśād iti |
T06sthtvbhu:791: tathā tatheti tasya tasya vikalpasyānantarotpādanasamarthāvasthāṃ prāpnotīty arthaḥ |
T06sthtvbhu:793: tathā hi cakṣurādivijñānaṃ svaśaktiparipoṣe vartamāne śaktiviśiṣṭasyālayavijñānapariṇāmasya nimittaṃ so 'pi
T06sthtvbhu:795: evam anyonyavaśād yasmād ubhayaṃ pravartate tasmād ālayavijñānād anyenānadhiṣṭhitād anekaprakāro vikalpaḥ sa sa jāyate |
T06sthtvbhu:796: tatra ca vartamāne janmani yathālayavijñānāt pravṛttivijñānasyotpattir bhavati tathākhyātam
T06sthtvbhu:797: idānīṃ vijñaptimātre anāgataṃ janma vartamānajanmanirodhe sati yathā pratisaṃdhīyate tat pradarśayann āha |
T06sthtvbhu:802: tena karmaṇā yad anāgatātmabhāvābhinirvṛttaye ālayavijñāne sāmarthyam āhitaṃ sā karmavāsanā
T06sthtvbhu:804: tatra vijñānāt pṛthag eva svasantānādhyāsitaṃ grāhyam astīty adhyavasāyo grāhyagrāhaḥ |
T06sthtvbhu:805: tac ca vijñānena pratīyate vijñāyate gṛhyata iti yo 'yaṃ niścayaḥ sa grahakagrāhaḥ |
T06sthtvbhu:808: grāhadvayavāsanā tu sarvakarmavāsanānāṃ yathāsvam ākṣiptātmabhāvotpādane pravṛttānāṃ sahakāritvaṃ pratipadyate |
T06sthtvbhu:810: evañ ca na kevalāḥ karmavāsanā grāhadvayavāsanānanugṛhītā vipākañ janayantīty uktaṃ bhavati
T06sthtvbhu:813: kṣīṇe pūrvavipāke 'nyaṃ vipākaṃ janayanti tad iti |
T06sthtvbhu:814: pūrvajanmopacitena karmaṇā ya iti vipāko 'bhinirvṛttas tasmin kṣīṇa ity
T06sthtvbhu:815: ākṣepakāle paryantāvasthite yathābalaṃ karmavāsanā grāhadvayavāsanāsahitā upabhūktād vipākād anyaṃ vipākaṃ tad evālayavijñānaṃ janayanti |
T06sthtvbhu:817: kṣīṇe pūrvavipāka ity anena śāśvatāntaṃ pariharati |
T06sthtvbhu:820: tad eva ca sarvabījakaṃ na cakṣurādivijñānam iti kuta etat |
T06sthtvbhu:824: tasmin sati gatiḥ sarvā nirvāṇādhigamo 'pi ca ||
T06sthtvbhu:825: na cālayavijñānam antareṇa saṃsārapravṛttir nivṛttir vā yujyate |
T06sthtvbhu:828: tatrālayavijñānād anyat saṃskārapratyayaṃ vijñānaṃ na yujyate |
T06sthtvbhu:830: saṃsārasyālayavijñānānabhyupagame pratisandhivijñānaṃ vā saṃskārapratyayaṃ parikalpyeta saṃskāraparibhāvitā vā ṣaḍ vijñānakāyāḥ |
T06sthtvbhu:831: tatra ye saṃskārāḥ prātisaṃdhikavijñānapratyayatveneṣyante teṣāñ ciraniruddhatvān niruddhasya cāsatvād asataś ca pratyayatvābhāvān na saṃskārapratyayaṃ pratisandhivijñānaṃ yujyate |
T06sthtvbhu:832: pratisandhau ca nāmarūpam apy asti na kevalaṃ vijñānam |
T06sthtvbhu:833: tatra vijñānam eva saṃskārapratyayaṃ na nāmarūpam iti kā tatra yuktiḥ |
T06sthtvbhu:837: yad uttarakālam iti cet tasya prātisandhikanāmarūpāt ka ātmātiśayo yatas tad eva vijñānapratyayaṃ na pūrvam |
T06sthtvbhu:839: ataś ca saṃskārapratyayaṃ nāmarūpam evāstu kiṃ pratisandhivijñānenāṅgāntareṇa parikalpitena
T06sthtvbhu:841: saṃskāraparibhāvitā vā ṣaḍvijñānakāyā api na saṃskārapratyayaṃ vijñānaṃ yujyate |
T06sthtvbhu:843: na hi vijñānaṃ vipākavāsanāṃ niṣyandavāsanāṃ vā svātmany ādhātuṃ samarthaṃ svātmani kāritravirodhāt
T06sthtvbhu:847: acittikāsu ca nirodhasamāpattyādyavasthāsu punaḥ saṃskāraparibhāvitacittotpattyasaṃbhavād vijñānapratyayaṃ nāmarūpaṃ na syāt |
T06sthtvbhu:849: evaṃ yāvaj jātipratyayaṃ jarāmaraṇaṃ na syāt |
T06sthtvbhu:850: tataś ca saṃsārapravṛttir eva na syāt |
T06sthtvbhu:851: tasmād avidyāpratyayāḥ saṃskārās tadadhivāsitañ cālayavijñānaṃ saṃskārapratyayaṃ vijñānam
T06sthtvbhu:852: tatpratyayaṃ pratisandhau nāmarūpam ity eṣaiva nītir anavadyā |
T06sthtvbhu:853: saṃsāranivṛttir api ālayavijñāne asati na yujyate |
T06sthtvbhu:854: saṃsārasya hi karmakleśāś ca kāraṇaṃ tayoś ca kleśāḥ pradhānam |
T06sthtvbhu:855: tathā hi kleśādhipatyāt karma punarbhavākṣepasamarthaṃ bhavati nānyathā |
T06sthtvbhu:857: 'pi karma kleśādhipatyād eva punarbhavo bhavati nānyathā |
T06sthtvbhu:858: evañ ca kleśā eva saṃsārapravṛtteḥ pradhānatvān mūlam |
T06sthtvbhu:859: atas teṣu prahīṇeṣu saṃsāro vinivartate nānyathā |
T06sthtvbhu:862: saṃmukhībhūto vā kleśaḥ prahīyate bījāvastho vā
T06sthtvbhu:863: | tatra saṃmukhībhūtaḥ prahīyata ity aniṣṭir eveyam |
T06sthtvbhu:865: na hi pratipakṣāt tadānīṃ kiñcid anyad abhyupagamyate yatra kleśabījaṃ vyavasthitaṃ tatpratipakṣeṇa prahīyeta |
T06sthtvbhu:867: na hi tat kleśabījānuṣaktam eva tatpratipakṣo bhavitum arhati |
T06sthtvbhu:869: tasmād avaśyam ālayavijñānaṃ tadanyavijñānasahabhūbhiḥ kleśopakleśair bhāvyate svabījapuṣṭyādhānata ity abhyupeyam |
T06sthtvbhu:870: ye punaś cittata eva saṃtatipariṇāmaviśeṣād yathābalaṃ vāsanāvṛttilābhe sati kleśopakleśāḥ pravartante teṣāñ cālayavijñānavyavasthitaṃ bījaṃ tatsahabhuvā kleśapratipakṣamārgeṇāpanīyate tasmiṃś cāpanīte na punas tenāśrayeṇa kleśānām utpattir iti sopadhiśeṣo nirvāṇadhātuḥ prāpyate
T06sthtvbhu:872: na hi karma vidyamānam api kleśeṣu prahīṇeṣu sahakārikāraṇabhāvāt punarbhavam abhinirvartayituṃ samartham |
T06sthtvbhu:873: evam ālayavijñāne sati saṃsārapravṛttir nivṛttiś ca nānyathety avaśyaṃ cakṣurādivijñānavyatiriktam ālayavijñānaṃ tad eva ca sarvadharmabījānugataṃ na cakṣurādivijñānam ity abhyupagantavyam vistaravicāras tu pañcaskandhakopanibandhād veditavyaḥ ||
T06sthtvbhu:874: yadi vijñaptimātram evedaṃ kathaṃ na sūtravirodhaḥ |
T06sthtvbhu:875: sūtreṣu hi trayaḥ svabhāvā uktāḥ parikalpitaḥ paratantraḥ pariniṣpannaś ca |
T06sthtvbhu:879: yena yena vikalpena yad yad vastu vikalpyate |
T06sthtvbhu:880: parikalpita evāsau svabhāvo na sa vidyate || 20
T06sthtvbhu:884: ādhyātmikaṃ bāhyaṃ vāntaśo yāvad buddhadharmā api |
T06sthtvbhu:888: yad vastu vikalpyaviṣayas tad yasmāt sattābhāvān na vidyate |
T06sthtvbhu:891: tathā hy ekasmin vastuni tadabhāve ca parasparaviruddhānekavikalpapravṛttir dṛṣṭā |
T06sthtvbhu:892: na ca tad ekaṃ vastu tadabhāvo vā parasparaviruddhānekasvabhāvo yujyate |
T06sthtvbhu:893: tasmāt sarvam idaṃ vikalpamātram eva tadarthasya parikalpitarūpatvāt |
T06sthtvbhu:895: na khalu punaḥ subhūte dharmās tathā vidyante yathā bālapṛthagjanā abhiniviṣṭā iti |
T06sthtvbhu:899: atra ca vikalpa iti paratantrasvarūpam āha |
T06sthtvbhu:904: parair hetupratyayais tantryata iti paratantra utpādyata ity arthaḥ |
T06sthtvbhu:908: niṣpannas tasya pūrveṇa sadā rahitatā tu yā || 21cd
T06sthtvbhu:910: tasyeti paratantrasya pūrveṇeti parikalpitena tasmin vikalpe grāhyagrāhakabhāvaḥ parikalpitaḥ
T06sthtvbhu:911: tathā hi tasmin vikalpe grāhyagrāhakatvam avidyamānam eva parikalpyata iti parikalpitam ucyate
T06sthtvbhu:912: tena grāhyagrāhakeṇa paratantrasya sadā sarvakālam atyantarahitatā yā sa pariniṣpannasvabhāvaḥ
T06sthtvbhu:913: ata eva sa naivānyo nānanyaḥ paratantrataḥ |
T06sthtvbhu:914: ata eva sa naiveti parikalpitena svabhāvena paratantrasya sadā rahitatā pariniṣpannaḥ |
T06sthtvbhu:916: sā ca dharmatā dharmān nānyā nānanyā yujyate |
T06sthtvbhu:917: pariniṣpannaś ca paratantradharmatety ataḥ paratantrāt pariniṣpanno nānyo nānanya iti boddhavyaḥ
T06sthtvbhu:918: yadi hi pariniṣpannaḥ paratantrād anyaḥ syād evaṃ na parikalpitena paratantraḥ śūnyaḥ syāt
T06sthtvbhu:919: athānanya evam api pariniṣpanno na viśuddhālambanaḥ syāt paratantravat saṃkleśātmakatvāt |
T06sthtvbhu:920: evaṃ paratantraś ca na kleśātmakaḥ syāt |
T06sthtvbhu:928: athānanyā evam api saṃskārāḥ pradhvaṃsābhāvarūpāḥ syur anityatāvat |
T06sthtvbhu:930: yadi grāhyagrāhakabhāvarahitaḥ paratantraḥ katham asau gṛhyate agṛhyamāṇo vā katham astīti vijñāyate |
T06sthtvbhu:933: nādṛṣṭe 'sminn iti pariniṣpannasvabhāve sa dṛśyata iti paratantraḥ
T06sthtvbhu:935: nirvikalpalokottarajñānadṛśye pariniṣpanne svabhāve adṛṣṭe apratividdhe asākṣātkṛte tatpṛṣṭhalabdhaśuddhalaukikajñānagamyatvāt paratantro 'nyena jñānena na gṛhyate |
T06sthtvbhu:937: na punar lokottarajñānapṛṣṭhalabdhenāpi jñānena na dṛśyate |
T06sthtvbhu:942: jñānañ ca yathoktaṃ nirvikalpena jñānenākāśasamatayā tān sarvadharmān paśyatīti paratantradharmāṇāṃ tathatāmātradarśanāt ||
T06sthtvbhu:943: yadi dravyam eva paratantraḥ kathaṃ sūtre sarvadharmā niḥsvabhāvā anutpannā aniruddhā iti nirdiśyante |
T06sthtvbhu:947: traya eva svabhāvā na caturtho 'stīti jñāpanārthaṃ saṃkhyānirdeśaḥ |
T06sthtvbhu:948: svena svena lakṣaṇena vidyamānavad bhavatīti svbhāvaḥ |
T06sthtvbhu:949: trividhā niḥsvabhāvatā lakṣaṇaniḥsvabhāvatā utpattiniḥsvabhāvatā paramārthaniḥsvabhāvatā ca
T06sthtvbhu:951: idānīṃ trividhasya svabhāvasya yā yasya niḥsvabhāvatā tāṃ tasya pradarśayann āha |
T06sthtvbhu:954: dharmāṇāṃ paramārthaś ca sa yatas tathatāpi saḥ |
T06sthtvbhu:955: prathamaḥ parikalpitaḥ svabhāvo 'yaṃ ca lakṣaṇenaiva niḥsvabhāvas
T06sthtvbhu:959: ataś ca svarūpābhāvāt khapuṣpavat svarūpeṇaiva niḥsvabhāvaḥ
T06sthtvbhu:962: ataś ca yathā prakhyāti tathāsyotpattir nāstīty ato 'syotpattiniḥsvabhāvatety ucyate |
T06sthtvbhu:963: dharmāṇāṃ paramārthaś ca sa yatas tathāpi sa iti |
T06sthtvbhu:964: paramaṃ hi lokottarajñānaṃ niruttaratvāt tasyārthaḥ paramārthaḥ |
T06sthtvbhu:965: atha vākāśavat sarvatraikarasārthena vaimalyāvikārārthena ca pariniṣpannaḥ svabhāvaḥ paramārtha ucyate |
T06sthtvbhu:966: sa yasmāt pariniṣpannaḥ svabhāvaḥ sarvadharmāṇāṃ paratantrātmakānāṃ paramārthaḥ |
T06sthtvbhu:967: taddharmateti kṛtvā tasmāt pariniṣpanna eva svabhāvaḥ paramārthaniḥsvabhāvātā pariniṣpannasyābhāvasvabhāvatvāt
T06sthtvbhu:972: kiṃ tarhi yāvanto dharmadhātuparyāyāḥ sarvais tair apy abhidhātavya iti ||
T06sthtvbhu:975: tathā hi pṛthagjanaśaikṣāśaikṣāvasthāsu sarvakālaṃ tathaiva bhavati |
T06sthtvbhu:977: kiṃ punas tathatāvat pariniṣpanna eva vijñaptimātratā |
T06sthtvbhu:982: nāmni tiṣṭhati tac cittaṃ tadā tanmātradarśanāt |
T06sthtvbhu:983: nāmni sthānāc ca vijñaptāv upalambhaḥ prahīyate ||
T06sthtvbhu:988: yadi vijñaptimātram evedaṃ kasmāc cakṣuḥśrotraghrāṇarasanasparśanaiḥ rūpaśabdagandharasasparśān gṛhṇātīty asya bhavatīty ata āha |
T06sthtvbhu:991: atha vā yās tāḥ karmavāsanā grāhadvayavāsanāsahitāḥ kṣīṇe pūrvavipāke 'nyaṃ vipākaṃ janayantīty
T06sthtvbhu:992: uktaṃ tasmāt kathaṃ prahāṇam aprahāṇaṃ cety ata āha |
T06sthtvbhu:995: yāvac cittadharmatāyāṃ vijñaptimātrasaṃśabditāyāṃ vijñānaṃ nāvatiṣṭhate kiṃ tarhi grāhyagrāhakopalambhe carati |
T06sthtvbhu:998: yāvad advayalakṣaṇe vijñaptimātratve yoginaś cittaṃ na pratiṣṭhitaṃ bhavati tāvad grāhyagrāhakānuśayo na vinivartate na prahīyata ity arthaḥ |
T06sthtvbhu:1002: idam idānīṃ vaktavyaṃ kim artharahitacittamātropalambhāc cittadharmatāvasthānam |
T06sthtvbhu:1005: vijñaptimātram evedam ity api hy upalambhataḥ |
T06sthtvbhu:1007: iti atha vā yaḥ punar ābhimānikaḥ śrutamātrakeṇa jānīyad ahaṃ vijñaptimātratāyāṃ śuddhāyāṃ sthita iti tadgrahavyudāsārtham āha |
T06sthtvbhu:1008: vijñaptimātram evedam ity api hy upalambhata ity (27ab)
T06sthtvbhu:1010: vijñaptimātram evedaṃ artharahitaṃ na bāhyo 'rtho 'stīty evam upalambhato grahaṇataḥ citrīkaraṇata ity artho 'grata ity abhimukhaṃ (Tvbh_136) sthāpayann iti yathāśrutaṃ manasā bahuprakāratvād yogācārālambanānāṃ kiṃcid ity āhāsthisaṃkalikaṃ vā vinīlakaṃ vā vipūyakaṃ vā vipaḍumakaṃ vā vyādhmātakādikaṃ vā tanmātre nāvatiṣṭhate vijñānopalambhāprahāṇāt |
T06sthtvbhu:1011: kadā punar vijñānagrāhasya prahāṇaṃ cittadharmātāyāñ ca pratiṣṭhito bhavatīty ata āha |
T06sthtvbhu:1012: yadā tv ālambanaṃ jñānaṃ naivopalabhate tadā |
T06sthtvbhu:1014: yasmin kāle deśanālambanaṃ avavādālambanaṃ prākṛtaṃ vā rūpaśabdādyālambanaṃ jñānaṃ bahiś cittān nopalabhate na paśyati na gṛhṇāti nābhiniviśate yathābhūtārthadarśanān na tu jātyandhavat tasmin kāle vijñānagrāhasya prahāṇaṃ svacittadharmatāyāṃ ca pratiṣṭhito bhavati |
T06sthtvbhu:1017: grāhye sati grāhako bhavati na tu grāhyābhāva iti |
T06sthtvbhu:1020: evaṃ hi (Tvbh_138) samasamālambyālambakaṃ nirvikalpaṃ lokottaraṃ jñānam utpadyate |
T06sthtvbhu:1021: grāhyagrāhakābhiniveśānuśayāḥ prahīyante svacittadharmatāyāṃ ca cittam avasthitaṃ bhavati
T06sthtvbhu:1022: yadaivaṃ vijñaptimātratāyāṃ cittam avasthitaṃ bhavati tadā kathaṃ vyapadiśyata ity āha |
T06sthtvbhu:1025: sa evānāsravo dhātur acintyaḥ kuśalo dhruvaḥ |
T06sthtvbhu:1028: tad anena ślokadvayena darśanamārgam ārabhyottaraviśeṣagatyā phalasaṃpattir udbhāvitā vijñaptimātratāpraviṣṭayoginaḥ
T06sthtvbhu:1030: anucitatvāl loke samudācārābhāvān nirvikalpatvāc ca lokād uttīrṇam iti jñānaṃ lokottarañ ca tad iti |
T06sthtvbhu:1031: tasya jñānasyānantaraṃ āśrayasya parāvṛttir bhavatīti jñāpanārtham āha |
T06sthtvbhu:1034: tasya parāvṛttir yā dauṣṭhulyavipākadvayavāsanābhāvena nivṛttau satyāṃ karmaṇyatādharmakāyādvayajñānabhāvena parāvṛttiḥ |
T06sthtvbhu:1035: sā punar āśrayaparāvṛttiḥ kasya prahāṇāt prāpyate |
T06sthtvbhu:1041: sā punar āśrayaparāvṛttiḥ śrāvakādigatadauṣṭhulyahānitaś ca prāpyate yad āha vimuktikāya iti
T06sthtvbhu:1042: bodhisattvagatadauṣṭhulyahānitaś ca prāpyate yad āha dharmākhyo 'yaṃ mahāmuner iti |
T06sthtvbhu:1043: dvidhā āvaraṇabhedena sottarā niruttarā cāśrayaparāvṛttir uktā |
T06sthtvbhu:1046: sarvabījaṃ kleśabījaṃ bandhas tatra dvayor dvayoḥ ||
T06sthtvbhu:1049: ādyasya kleśabījaṃ itarasya dvayāvaraṇabījaṃ tadudghātāt sarvajñatāvāptir bhavatīti |
T06sthtvbhu:1059: sukho nityatvād eva yad anityaṃ tad duḥkhaṃ ayaṃ ca nitya iti tasmāt sukhaḥ |
T06sthtvbhu:1061: sa evāśrayaparāvṛttilakṣaṇo dharmākhyo 'py ucyate mahāmuner bhūmipāramitābhāvanayā kleśajñeyāvaraṇaprahāṇāt
T06sthtvbhu:1063: saṃsārāparityāgāt tadanupasaṃkleśatvād bodhisattvānāṃ sarvadharmavibhutvalābhataś ca dharmakāya ity ucyate |
T06sthtvbhu:1064: mahāmuner iti paramauneyayogād buddho bhagavān mahāmunir iti ||
